Characters

Power Shifts

Use Posthuman Powershifts

  • Take 2 power shift at Character Creation (only one level per shift)
  • May buy an additional powershift in place of an advancement in a given tier for 4XP.
  • Vampires, Therians and Venatori may only take 3 power shifts in any given ability.
  • Humans, Sussuri and Minorem may apply only 1 shift to any given ability, Single Attack and Power may be taken multiple times for different attacks and powers.

Tier 6+

For characters who continue past the sixth tier, advancement is as such.

For 4XP you get one of:

  • +4 to any pool
  • any Type, Focus or Background ability even if it was swapped out
  • Reduce the cost for wearing armor. This option lowers the Speed penalty for wearing armor by 1.
  • Add 2 to your recovery rolls.
  • 1 power shift

For 10XP you can buy a new Focus to buy abilities from. You must buy the abilities in order as above. You do not gain Tier 1 abilities at this time, each must be purchased individually for 4XP.

Background

  • Practiced in Occult Knowledge. It is assumed that player characters are aware of the occult, however, if you are a human and not yet aware of the occult you may take occult knowledge as an inability and take some other knowledge base to be trained in,.
  • Choose 1 Non-combat Skill to be trained in that benefits your prior training
  • Choose 1 Non-combat Skill to be trained in that is a hobby
  • Spend 4 points in any Pools
  • Pick a Focus that represents your Species and take the Tier 1 abilities free. You may swap out the ability in this Focus as if it were a Type ability for Tiers 2 through 6.
    • Venatori: Slays Monsters (76) -- may choose any generic weapon type instead of swords except gun or unarmed, Looks for Trouble (71), Is Licensed to Carry (70)
    • Sussuri: Awakens Dreams (64), Crafts Unique Objects (66) -- specifically alchemical potions and concoctions
    • Therian: Howls at the Moon (69)
    • Vampire: Siphons Power (76) - Swap Tier 2 with Tier 1 Drain Creature is free. Drain machine only works on cyphers and artifacts not powered objects like robots etc.
    • Human: Doesn't Do Much (67), Works for a Living (78), Learns Quickly (71)
    • Minorem: (Half Human, Half Venatori) May choose from either Human, Sussuri or Venatori options

Human Modifications

  • Humans may choose 1 disability and take 1 ability to add to their background that makes sense for the character.
  • This disability should be a weakness in a pool, 1 less cypher to their limit, 2 narrow inabilities or 1 broad inability.
  • Humans may opt out of both the disability and ability and not use this rule.

Venatori and Half Human Venatori Modifications

  • Have an inability intellect defense and gain the Limited Rune Caster Ability.

Sussuri and Half Sussuri Venatori Modifications

  • Have an inability in might defense and gain the Rune Caster Ability.

Therian Modifications

  • Have an inability in anger management and can communicate their disease through bodily fluid exchanges, they gain the Extra Recovery (138)† Ability
  • Born Therian undergo their first transition with the moon typically between the ages of 22 and 25.
  • A Bitten Therian regardless of age transitions upon the first full moon after the bite.
    • There is a chance the bitten therian will mutate the disease and become human during the full moon. Roll 1d100, if the roll is a 1 your disease is reversed and after the full moon has ended you will shift into your wolf form until the next full moon in which you will become human for 3 days.
    • There is a chance the bitten therian will not transform and just be a carrier. Roll a 1d20, if the roll is a 19 or 20 you are just a carrier and do not use the Therian Focus, you do however keep the inability and granted abilities in this modification.

Vampire Modifications

  • Vampires are vulnerable to radiant and fire damage taking +2 extra damage.
  • They are immediately impaired if they take a wooden stake through the heart.
  • In direct sunlight all tasks are hindered and taken +1 radiant damage/round (vulnerable damage does not apply here).
  • Vampires gain the Extra Recovery (138)† Ability and Far Step (138) Ability.
  • A vampire may purchase the following abilities by spending +10XP after Tier 3
    • Sire a Childe
    • Take a Lesser Chevalier
    • Day Walker
    • Take a Greater Chevalier (requires Take a Lesser Chevalier)
    • Shadow walk -- Teleportation (190)
